title: Spain Tourism Revenues
description: Tourism Revenues in Spain decreased to 9034 EUR Million in August from 9342 EUR Million in July of 2022. Tourism Revenues in Spain averaged 3441.55 EUR Million from 1993 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 9408 EUR Million in August of 2019 and a record low of 0 EUR Million in April of 2020. The tourism sector accounts for around 15 percent of the Spanish GDP. This page provides - Spain Tourism Revenues- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Spain
